price: 40. Kasi tozuaki ye na mapinga naye, mpe tobwakaki bango okati ya mbonge тропа ezaleli naye ya mabe.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
